name: Helping Hand (itch)
description:
-Helping Hand-

We've just finished the development!

Welcome to full experience of Helping Hand! A game about expressing yourself using only your left hand. What about your right hand, you say? Well that’s broken. As well as all the other bones and muscles in your body. Find out why and explore the different environments and character within this indie game!

Controls: Use "1,2,3,4" and "Space Bar" to communicate.

Also available on Steam! :  https://store.steampowered.com/app/820880/Helping_Hand/
